title: Donations for Open Source Projects
description: Learn about the importance of donations for open source projects, how they help sustain development, and platforms like GitHub Sponsors and Open Collective that enable contributions. Discover ways to support open source projects and their maintainers.
keywords: donations, open source, support, sustainability, GitHub Sponsors, Open Collective, crowdfunding for open source, open source funding, corporate sponsorships, open source platforms, donation platforms
